section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter applies to enrollment transactions and data exchanged between an electric distribution company and a CCA or its designated agents.

section.heading: Standards.
section.text: For all data exchanges aside from exchanges using Maryland standard electronic data exchange, per COMAR 20.53.01.03, electric companies and a CCA shall mutually agree upon a standardized approach subject to Commission approval.

section.heading: Cybersecurity.
section.text: CCA and electric companies shall maintain the exchange of data in a manner consistent with good cybersecurity practice.

para.text: An electric company shall provide a CCA with written instructions on how to access, via the approved Commission methods, the customer lists and other information provided under this chapter.
An electric company may provide data exchange procedures for CCAs via tariff.

section.heading: Operating Procedures.
section.text: A CCA shall comply with directions provided by an electric company regarding transmission and security of customer data.
